headline: 3 Industrials Stocks with Mounting Challenges
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. Unfortunately, this role also comes with a demand profile tethered to the ebbs and flows of the broader economy, and investors seem to be forecasting a downturn - over the past six months, the industry has pulled back by 1.4%. This drawdown was disheartening since the S&P 500 gained 1.9%.
